name: Ayour Chronicles
description:
This RPG game is developped for in the context of the Kindered Community Jam,

This is a procedurally generated adventure with a rogue like environment.

Hope you like it !!

Credits:

I developed every part of the project but had to use some  publicly available art resources and music. I give credit to these creators
